how do I purge a package that i've alrea: dpkg - warning: ignoring request to remove jaolt which isn't installed.
if it doesnt show up in: dpkg -l | grep jaolt then you will need to reinstall it then run: sudo apt-get --purge remove jaolt
if there is no output with the dpkg then the old config is gone (except in $home
